body.p:
Woodsonville Ky Aug the. 19./61
Gov Magoffin
Dear sir

permit me to introduce my friend Mr Maxey the representive of Hart he is a Bachelor and wants a wife I hope you will hich him to some young Lady Gov I have to ask a favor of you about three years agoe I was present at afight and anotice was served on me to apeare at the Equity cort at Glasgowe I gave abond of $50 dollars for my apearance I clearly for got when cort was and at the last june Term of the cort they rendered judgement against me if your honor will I hope you will release me from the judgement
as times are hard and money cearse I have to save all I can there was no one injured in my not attending cort please write me at your Earliest convenience

cant you stop this dam ware it is bringing distruction on all of us I expect to start south the first of October and think I will have to get a leter as a pass from you to the Govnor of Tennessee and Mississippi
